website_summaries.verdict: While the Bose SoundSport In-Ear may not be the best sounding in-ear headphone for the money, the design and comfort level are great, and it's ideal for people who want this sort of headphone style without the need to jam the tips into their ear canals.
pros: The Bose SoundSport In-Ear headphones are secure and comfortable as well as sweat-resistant, and their "open" design is appealing
They also offer pleasantly full bass and include an integrated remote and microphone and a nice carrying case
cons: They let sound in, so they're not good for noisier environments

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been replacing his ear buds at least once a year, every year (for so many years I can't count!) for various reasons, so we decided to go big and upgrade to the more expensive Bose in-ear headphones. He loves these headphones. They stay put when he wears them, and they have fantastic sound just like his other Bose products. These are well worth the investment. (Bose products are expensive, but SO good; my husband is a musician, and he values exceptional sound quality). In addition, they came with a handy little case, which he uses diligently to protect them between uses. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome headphones! -great sound quality for music playback -good ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome headphones! -great sound quality for music playback -good headset when used during phone calls (even Skype calls on my laptop) -super durable--I typically kill these things after 1 year of use because I wear them at the gym all the time. This one, after 1 year and half, still no frays. I have accidentally washed this at least 2 times (just have to air it out and dry and you're good to go).
customer_reviews.author: Jiraiya Sensei

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workout headphones. They have spend many sweaty hours, providing valuable entertainment and continue to work great. They do not block out all of the ambient noise, like a car approaching from behind, which is good. A little expensive, but they have lasted much longer than any headphone I have purchased. They stay put in you ear without feeling uncomfortable. The flexible earpieces are comfortable and easily replaceable. I searched on Amazon or eBay for very inexpensive replacements, bought a three-pack, and haven't needed any.
customer_reviews.author: LaVar

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I Made in 2015
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I made in 2015, hands down. These earbuds stay in my ears perfectly while I'm running, they're super comfortable, they have great sound, and they hold up to a LOT of wear and tear (I've had mine for almost a year and they still work great). My only small complaint would be that the soft plastic buds deteriorate a bit, but mine still work fine, even if they look a little disheveled.
customer_reviews.author: Shane and Celie

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is also the best I've found in an earbud
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything as a runner and wanted quality sound paired with something that will stay put in my ear. Once you start sweating, any ear bud begins to slip and becomes a nuisance thereafter. With Bose's earpieces, they stay put. The soft plastic part that makes contact with your ear fits very snug once you find the right size (they come with three sizes). The sound quality is also the best I've found in an earbud. I've tried beats, skull candy, the cheap iphone ones, and many others, but these are the best. Also, I've run them through the washer and drier and they still work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the design and execution are excellent. The price is what it is
customer_reviews.text: As with all Bose products, the design and execution are excellent. The price is what it is, but the product is obviously built to last. As a runner, I appreciate that the SoundSport sits firmly in my ear. They are also more sweat-resistant than other earbuds I have had before. Sound quality is very good, but not overwhelming. Lacks slightly at the very high and low ends
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. no noise canceling, which may be an issue for some people. I've tried a few "wing" style sport headphones and for some reason these don't fall out of my ears like the others. I was using the JayBird wireless ones, which sounded good, but kept falling out of my ears and cutting off (Bluetooth connectivity).
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Good. Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: Great sport headphones, very comfortable, they seem sturdy. I had hoped for more bass, but they're super clear sounding, and have great treble. They do not block any outside sounds.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Less than two year life-span
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for less than two years and the right earbud just recently stopped working. Yes I've used them a decent amount in those two years but that's still a short life span on headphones that cost almost $100. Also, since day one there was a subtle fuzz sound in the right headphone that came and went. Two stars, and that's generous.
customer_reviews.author: nyy615

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these (Amazon was great about the return), but the microphone isn't working again. These shouldn't be that complicated and should work "out of the box." This is not a good product. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: DC Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly poor quality
customer_reviews.text: A few months in and I couldn't be more displeased with the quality of these headphones. Every Bose product I've ever owned has been second to none in terms of quality -- theses headphones are trash. The jack might as well be made out of tinfoil it's so flimsy and reacts to sweat and gets tarnished -- A GREAT QUALITY IN A SPORT HEADPHONE!! The sound is only incrementally better than the headphones that come with an iPhone. Not worth it at all. Embarrassing product from a brand I can no longer trust.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and just Ok sound.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok, fit is ok, but probably not worth the $149 I paid. Hindsight being what it is, I would opt for some cheaper ones if I had it to do over again. One nice feature is the volume control on the cord and the cord does have a clip. Overall nice, but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: John Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundSport In-Ear Headphones for iOS...
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Obvious that it had been used and returned before.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Smith

customer_reviews.title: For $100 I would expect this product to last longer a lot longer and expected it to be high quality so I would can not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for 1 year and they have worked very well up until last week but all of a sudden the microphone does not work. Volume control works as do ear buds but microphone does not and it's been tested on multiple devices. For $100 I would expect this product to last a lot longer and expect it to be high quality so I would can not recommend this product to anyone based on the high price and it only lasting 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Padraig

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for working out.
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. So good that I took mine everywhere and eventually lost them somewhere. Multiple ear buds to fit your needs and now it has an even longer cord. Great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Brad D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: The sound got a lot better when I switched from the medium tips to large ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound got a lot better when I switched from the medium tips to large tips. The highs are not as crisp as I like. Otherwise they are pretty good. The sound isolation is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Cool tunes for my dude.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby on Father's Day. He's constantly listening to music everywhere he goes-SO, how perfect to arm him with Bose earphones. He's very productive now!
customer_reviews.author: andrea vasquez

customer_reviews.title: An expensive bust
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed. I had a pair of these headphones and I adored them....I finally wore them out after four years so I ordered these as a replacement. Up until this week they would have gotten four stars from me, but now they are not working properly. They only work intermittently and the connection portion of the headphones seems not to be connecting properly. Really unfortunately, there is only a one month return policy and I am two days past due to return. I'm hoping perhaps they will replace them anyway. For the price I certainly expect them to last longer than one month!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly with free two day shipping. Ear buds were packaged in the factory box. They're outstanding! I use them for running and have had no problems with them falling out. The sound is outstanding. Basic operations on the iPhone work through the microphone piece. The best ear buds for exercise I have owned. I debated between these and the jay bird bluebuds. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: RunnerMan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stable in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so that I could hear some outside noise as I run. They work well. Very comfortable and stable in my ears. And the sound is excellent. The lows are a little lacking which is expected for not being actually in the ear canal. And it's fine since it can be compensated for with a little EQ. And the depth, midrange and highs are much better than I expected. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good running ear buds!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones! The only thing keeping it from being a solid 5 stars is the awkwardness of finding the inline mic for phone calls when wearing the headphones. As for quality though, the sound is great and the earphones are solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wells

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile for use
customer_reviews.text: Bose quality / durability / value - WAY off. These lasted less than a month of careful use. Now left ear only and no mike. Check out AYL bluetooth buds for $25 ...
customer_reviews.author: Edmund C. Peirce

customer_reviews.title: ... as my shure headphones but the sound is still good and they definitely stay in your ear when working ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit in my ear as snugly as my shure headphones but the sound is still good and they definitely stay in your ear when working out. But I would go back to Shure for my next set of headphones most likely.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOUND, STAYS PUT WHAT MORE CAN YOU ASK ...
customer_reviews.text: GOOD SOUND, STAYS PUT WHAT MORE CAN YOU ASK FOR? I HAD THE BEATS HEADPHONES AND THESE ARE SUPERB!!
customer_reviews.author: Plantfreak

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Used headphones. Damaged box, discolored ear pieces. What a joke for being over $100. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Would love a replacement pair or a refund
customer_reviews.text: Headphones broke after a few months. Would love a replacement pair or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barton T Chasler

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best out there, you can stop looking now...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound range and very secure fit, even while sweating in the Florida heat. These also have about the best sounding microphone of any I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: The CajunYankee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality and duravility
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality and duravility, worth the money I payed for this set, I will be Bose customer for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro V. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headphones I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable headphones I've ever used. Literally forget I'm wearing them at times. The fact that they sound great is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Burr

customer_reviews.title: Great but already broken....
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked great for a few times. But now the controls stopped working. And there's no way to contact the seller to get their help. I don't appreciate spending $100 on headphones and them already being broken....
customer_reviews.author: un-satisfied Customer in TX

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: works well...not sure sound is better than standard pair of headphones that come with the iphone, but these are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Put a lock on it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, great product. If you don't want or like noise-canceling, this is perfect. My wife stole them within a day.
customer_reviews.author: mburris

customer_reviews.title: i love these headphone that been said you have to be ...
customer_reviews.text: i love these headphone that been said you have to be very careful with the connector. it can bend really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shinricky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds that I have ever owed! Worth the price if you are a runner!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Not my kind of sound...thin and sizzling.
customer_reviews.text: The construction seemed just fine, but the sound was all highs and sizzling. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: boa2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for working out. Sturdy and sweat resistant. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Good workout headphones
customer_reviews.text: Not noise cancelling but still solid sound. Great when you run with a friend so you can hear if they talk to you or a car is coming ir whatever
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! So glad I decided to upgrade form the very uncomfortable Apple ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: crazedshopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bose
customer_reviews.text: It's a Bose, what can I say? Besides, it was easy to find a new phone cover to match!
customer_reviews.author: MaisyDae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds on the market, you can't go wrong with BOSE
customer_reviews.author: walrus

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts ever. Teen boy was very excited to get this item. Works great. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Runner
customer_reviews.text: I'm a runner and have bought many sports headphones, these are the best because they stay in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: txex82

customer_reviews.title: Amazing durability and sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my very active and music loving husband who has always hated things in his ears. It was a risk
customer_reviews.author: Jesse22

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome headphones. The Sound quality is great and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome headphones. The Sound quality is great and they do a decent job of noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Hanfland123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Gift - happily received, very comfortable and sound is great. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Greco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my headphones. I use them for running, homework, kayaking, riding my motorcycle, pretty much anything. GREAT headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Solares

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for Workout!!
customer_reviews.text: love my headphones, and i tried different brands but this ones stand by itself for best to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Tirso J Luis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit... confortable... and sounds great! i recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jesus De Castro

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting! The headset arrived without a box (1st) clue ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid $115.00 for a used headset. Disgusting! The headset arrived without a box (1st) clue (2nd) they smelled like BO and were discolored from use.
customer_reviews.author: jeff a recker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds!! Most fall out of my ears but these are very comfortable and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: jean bunton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and she loves them. The sound is great and they are super comfortable in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for active music lovers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift and the recipient loves them. Perfect for running and using at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moyer

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend in the presence of dogs who like to chew
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair. I don't recommend in the presence of dogs who like to chew, but they are amazeballs.
customer_reviews.author: James Edward Holley

customer_reviews.title: I had to return the item before they were even ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the item before they were even used. As I was plugging them, the jack broke off. I have sent them back and already received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My earbuds have stopped working properly. They are fuzzy and the volume controls stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. You cant go wrong with the quality of music.
customer_reviews.author: Elesha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't sound as good as I thought they would for Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wager`

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: While the sound is as impressive as you would expect from Bose the amount of ambient outside noise you will hear is potentially quite off putting. I don't like true noise canceling headphones for running as I think it is dangerous so it doesn't bother me for running. That said,I tried to use thiese for normal commuting ( train etc) and found them too distracting compared with with my sennheiser ear buds so I will only use them for running.
customer_reviews.author: Maturin

customer_reviews.title: We love them. Clear sound and stay put ear plugs......
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one for my BF and one for me. We love them. Clear sound and stay put ear plugs........Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travel Diva

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit perfectly in ears. Sound quality good, but not great.

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones for doing exercise
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, no need to say more. The best headphones for doing exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Xianbin Meng

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them and after about a week sound stopped working very disapointing.

customer_reviews.title: I'd like a replacement or my money back" https
customer_reviews.text: "I bought a pair of Bose head phone in July and they are already defective. I'd like a replacement or my money back"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very clear and they are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: William S Blanton

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound nice when they work
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound nice when they work, but unfortunately I purchased a pair and within 30 days the left speaker started to hiss. Amazon replaced them, yet a few months later I have the same issue. Left speaker is hissing. Unfortunately, I am outside of the 30 day return policy. Bose products are normally good, but not the SoundSports.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: but i thought it would last a long time and it didn't

customer_reviews.title: Great! First time I had ear buds that did ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! First time I had ear buds that did not fall out!!

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable but they DO NOT work with the iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable but they DO NOT work with the iPhone 6plus. Returning and searching for another pair.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected so much more from the Bose family. I couldn't find anything special about them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carr

product_meta.title: Bose SoundSport In-Ear Headphones for iOS Models, Orange
product_meta.description: SoundSport In-Ear Headphones energize your workout with full, balanced sound that conventional sports earbuds can't match. And because they're sweat-resistant and have proprietary StayHear tips, they survive and stay comfortably in place during vigorous exercises. They come with a matching carrying case and provide easy control for select iPod, iPhone and iPad models. Available in Orange, Blue or Green. What's in the box: SoundSport In-Ear Headphones, 3-pairs StayHear tips (S, M, L), Carry case, Extension cable (21 inches) and Clothing clip.
feature_bullets: Tonally balanced audio with crisp highs and deep low notes
Sweat- and weather-resistance using hydrophobic acoustic cloth for workouts indoors and out
StayHear tips remain in place even during strenuous workouts
Lightweight, durable carrying case stores and protects headphones, plus holds cash and keys during workouts
Take calls and control music with the inline mic/remote

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars176 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
